channel.title: [REQ] Full Runecrafter robes/hat/staff [REQ]
channel.description:
--REQUESTING--
full runecrafter robes
=JUST ONE COLOR= *Blue
=THE FULL SET= *Hat with or without goggles, dosen't really matter. *Robe Top *Robe Bottom *air runecrafting talisman staff.
=THANKS=
=EDIT= *Used [b]www.google.com couldn't come up with anything[/b]
*Used [b]the search bar..seem noone has come up with the idea yet[/b]
Thanks!

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2009, 10:03:57 pm[/size][hr][quote author=ModAssassin link=topic=375720.msg2831339#msg2831339 date=1245376956]

I’m not going to make that video in like 2-3weeks actually.
Need some more noobs 2 call in it No not to phone them rofl[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2009, 03:52:21 am[/size][hr]I’m the 2nd MCW Actually

are you saying in 2 -3 week you will make one?

and lol nice cough corny cough joke

lol jk

yeah so like i got the cape almost done…so i might like fuse out two models together…idk what the RSMV id’s for the runecrafting robes are…but do u think that wud be possible?

which 2 models would you fuse? the cape and what?

mine. got bored and edited my farming cape…since i’m not using farming i just edited the cape. but mine fucking suckes lmfao so i’ll just use you’res >.<
[/quote]

sounds good im starting to color his robes white

i already got his belt red and his cape, also i got hist stealth knife. finally im almost done with his sleeve and his head[/quote]

on the cape? cuz i got all his robes done…and both his blades.
